work.description: Handled aircraft arrivals and managed all baggage loading and unloading for both incoming and outgoing flights. I also worked as a start-up leader, responsible for communication between the pilot and the pushback operator during departures. The role required strong teamwork, quick problem-solving, and the ability to collaborate effectively in a fast-paced environment.

Part-time appointment setter for a digital marketing agency specializing in website development and SEO. I handled initial outreach, identified client needs, and booked qualified meetings, gaining strong communication skills and a solid understanding of how web and SEO services are sold.

In 2022, I was offered a position as a salesperson at a marketing agency. The job involved first booking meetings with other companies and then attending the sales meetings myself to pitch our services, which in this case were digital marketing solutions. I gained a lot of knowledge in areas such as digital marketing, but most importantly in sales and building trust. The role required strong social skills and the ability to adapt, as I met with different companies in person on a regular basis.
